entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
